Package org.genson.annotation

This package provides useful annotations to configure some features used during serialization/deserialization.

See:
          Description

Annotation Types Summary
Creator Static methods annotated with @Creator annotation will act as method factories.
HandleClassMetadata Annotated Serializer/Deserializer/Converter with @HandleClassMetadata indicate that they will handle @class metadata during serialization and deserialization.
HandleNull  
JsonIgnore You can annotate with @JsonIgnore the methods, fields and creators that must be ignored during serialization AND deserialization.
JsonProperty JsonProperty annotation can be used to define the name of a property.
WithBeanView Annotation used actually only in spring web integration GensonMessageConverter to indicate at runtime what BeanView must be used.
WithoutBeanView Annotated Serializer/Deserializer/Converter will be excluded from the BeanView mechanism.
 

Package org.genson.annotation Description

This package provides useful annotations to configure some features used during serialization/deserialization.
